short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Go to any dealer site, scrap the vins and get links to check the price to the CarGurus value!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shopping for a used vehicle in this crazy market can be a real challenge! How do you know if you are getting the best price? Is there room for negotiation? By using the Car Values extension you will be able to walk into or chat with dealership with the data you need to make sure you are getting the best price!

The extension will work on any dealer or other car shopping site where vins are available. It will scrape all the vins it can find and generate links to take you to CarGurus.com's Car Values page. It will pass the vin and show you what it has determined is the Instant value!

Shop for your next used car with confidence armed with the data you need to ensure you get the best deal!
